descriptions:
["DescriptionLUXHABITAT is glad to present this brand new luxury 2 bedroom apartment in Jumeirah Living Marina Gate. This apartment features views of the swimming pool, community and skyline. 
The project will be handed over in the second quarter of 2020 and it features a convenient payment plan:
-10% down payment
-10% in 3 months 
-30% upon handover
-50% for 4 years post - handover 
- 4% Dubai Land Department registration fee - waived 
The facade of the building is contemporary and has modern interiors to match. Each apartment is designed to maximise indoor space with double-height ceilings, spacious balconies and floor to ceiling windows. The modern vertical lines of the facade mesh well with the inspiring interiors. The views from each apartment are breath-taking, ranging from the Dubai city skyline to the beautiful yachts by the jetties. As soon as you step outside the building, you would find yourself in the exciting Marina Walk and enjoy a stroll by the water's edge. Also located close by is The Walk at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Amenities for residents include a temperature-controlled infinity pool overlooking the marina including a children's pool and play area, a two-level gym overlooking the marina with separate changing facilities for men and women, including a steam room and sauna, and squash and tennis courts. For speed and convenience, there are seven high-speed elevators and a dedicated service elevator with a loading dock for residents."]

The plot size is 13,578 square feet and the buyer will have permission to build an expansive 10,183 square feet villa which can be designed to suit their own individual taste and requirements.This is a rare opportunity to buy one of the most sought after plot locations anywhere on the Palm, so viewings are highly recommended. descriptions:
['DescriptionIQI Properties is proud to present, premium villa and townhouse gated community in MBR City, Grand Views. Comprised of 476 luxurious townhouses and villas, neighboring the world class Meydan hotel and the Al Maktoum Palace.
The villas at Grand Views are elegant in design and contemporary in feel with premium quality finishes resonating a unique mix of form and function.
Features:
* Fully fitted modern bathrooms
* Contemporary styled finishes (Glass and Stainless Steel Railings)
* Elegant Italian marbles in the living and dining rooms
* Premium standard hard wood parquet flooring in all bedrooms
* Roof top with superb gazebo
* Outside two car parking and private garden
* Community temp controlled pool with separate kids pool and play area
* Finest retail center (Shops and restaurants)
